name: Mathlock
description:
🔑 Mathlock!

A math puzzle for the Game Boy - solve as many equations as possible by matching operators to the numbers before time is up!

The total is computed from left to right, and must match the goal. Each match generates a new equation and adds a few seconds to the clock. Points are doubled in Hard Mode. Try to make a new high score!

Controls Change Slot
A / D (Left / Right)
Change Sign
W / S (Up / Down)
A / B Buttons
Z / X
Start / Pause
Return
